oai_dc:dc.dc:description: When the man digs up the new Ssho |oa, he bites off and chews a small piece of the root and spits out the saliva into a hole in the ground with the plant still in it so that it may 'know' him.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: What the man does and says to the new Ssho |oa so that it may know him
